title: In game lag?
body:
To whom it may concern,

I game heavily and even stream games like GTA V which is graphically demanding as well as network demanding,
to stream such a game. I port forwarded all my ports and I'm even using DMZ mode.
I set the lol.exe in the processes to high priority as well as run the launcher in compatible mode for windows 7
as well as given it administrator rights. I've done everything listed on the internet but still...
While I am playing in-game my character won't allow me to use abilities and I can run around freely
but I end up teleporting back to where I started lagging and most of the time I get killed by the enemy player...
This is extremely annoying especially because I main Nidalee in the jungle...
I know it's not my internet(150+mbps Down, 10mbps Up, on the rogers network) as this is the only game it happens to, as well my music on Soundcloud doesn't stop
or skip and when i tab out of the game I see my wifi is still full... my frames are way above 60 and I've even tried 
locking it to 60 frames with no avail.

Thanks,
Your Gamer,
Zerchys

replies.body:

Your average ping was 41 milliseconds, which means your ping was good overall.

The worst ping you experienced was 45ms. This indicates your connection was stable for this game.

You had minimal packet loss during this game, meaning you had a very stable connection.

also used the hextec tool before this log

Thanks for the update on all this!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look.  Since you've already used HRT, grab the logs and attach it to the ticket for context.  We'll respond asap!

Even though everything else requiring connection might seem fine, you can still have problem connection to specific servers- in this case our game server.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to really find out for sure.  The results should provide what's causing hiccups as well as troubleshooting steps.  You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewall settings to make sure that's setup properly.  Let me know what you find!
